name: Sleeper Service
description:
GOOD MORNING . YOU HAVE BEEN WOKEN BRIEFLY FROM CRYOSLEEP TO PERFORM ROUTINE SHIP INSPECTION . PLEASE PROVIDE EVIDENCE OF 1 HELM AT FLAT ANGLE 2 GOOD HYPERSAP POTENCY 3 SHIP AI HAS NOT BECOME SENTIENT . AFTER THAT YOU MAY RETURN TO SLEEP

Would you like to feel like you have been given a reasonable and achievable task that actually needs doing but it isn't really stressful?!

This is the game for you!!

Nobody's breathing down your neck, honestly nobody's even checking up on you, there's even a way you can cheekily finish the game even though the tasks aren't all done, you'll totally get away with it.

  • A short and pretty chill adventure game!
  • Low stakes, low interaction, have a nice time exploring a cool spaceship
  • Some secrets and surprises!
  • Completable in one sitting
  • I made it in three weeks
    • if that's compelling or detrimental I'm not sure, but it's true
